quote: I was wise enough to never grow up while fooling most people into believing I had.  – Margaret Mead
fact: The cruise liner, Queen Elizabeth II, moves only six inches for each gallon of diesel that it burns.
joke: What did the Buffalo say to his little boy when he dropped him off at school? Bison.
